item.description:
The Boston AREIA's mission is to provide networking and educational opportunities for investors in the Boston area, and to motivate those investors to take action to become successful.
Meetings are held on the third Thursday of every month. Pre-meeting networking opportunities begin at 5:30 PM.
If you would like to be added to our mailing list so we can keep you informed visit our website at http://www.BostonAREIA.com
Visitors Pay $25, ***members are Free
***Please note that members of this meetup are NOT automatically members of Boston Area REIA. To become a member, visit -http://www.BostonAREIA.com
item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association
